1.text: Do not wash the strawberries if you're storing them in the fridge.

3.text: Store the strawberries at room temperature if you'll eat them in a few hours.

4.text: Don't store the strawberries in the plastic containers they came in.

5.text: Store strawberries in an open Tupperware container.

6.text: Store strawberries in a sealed Tupperware container.

7.text: Store strawberries on a baking tray.

9.text: Store the strawberries using the cookie-sheet method.

10.text: Store the strawberries with simple syrup.

12.text: Store the strawberries in a zip-lock bag.

13.text: Store the strawberries as ice cubes.
